vsParam:
OK, done ♪
This is my making method of Ice bomb.

Nelke, let's compare them.
This is my Ice bomb, and this is [px]'s.

Um... They look so different.
And the ingredients are different too...

It's just that they share the same name
and both are blended in a cauldron.

Yeah, kind of.
But they're both super freezing!

Yeah. I can't believe items with similar effects do exist
in these two worlds and even share the same name...

Yeah, it shocked me too when I was new here.
I couldn't believe they even got the same name~

A bomb that could release cold air is really convenient.
Maybe most alchemy systems have got this.

Alchemy systems... Alchemy is a discipline,
so it's got a system. And we can make items as needed?

Yeah, as needed. Without demand, there's no alchemy...
I think that's pretty much the gist.

Oh... An alchemist that I know once said the same thing and claimed
he'd even write down a secret recipe if necessary.
Even in a different world, you could make necessary items.
Right. Maybe... this is alchemy's origin.
Thank you so much, Totori, for all your advice.

And I'm also very sorry...
to have asked you to help me with my study...

It's OK. Never mind.
It's a learning process for me too!
Plus... Hehe, "Master Peppermint" asked me to do this. ♪

Huh!? Hmm... Yeah! Good for you, Totori!
That's so considerate of you, ha... haha...

Even the impressive Totori adores Peppermint...!
Master Peppermint is so admirable!

As the Administrator of Westwald,
I'll double my efforts to be as good as my master!

Oh... Yeah, right.
Keep trying, Nelke— Oh.
